tech_news.description: Instagram will now cap hashtags to five per post, according to Instagram chief Adam Mosseri.

tech_news.title: Google’s Gemini app can check videos to see if they were made with Google AI - The Verge
tech_news.description: Google launched a verification feature to its Gemini app that can check if a video was made using Google’s own AI.

tech_news.title: Apple builds single AI model that can see, create and edit images - 9to5Mac
